oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Here's your mule
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mules; Saddles; Sheet music covers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover features full side view of saddled mule. Beyond the mule are army camp tents. "Here's Your Mule" written in arc across cover. "Comic Camp Song and Chorus by C.D. Benson."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: German & Bro. Lith. (Louisville, Ky.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Kenneth D. Rose Sheet Music Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Heard frequently in Civil War army camps, the title came from a farmer whose mules had been commandeered by John Hunt Morgan, a Confederate cavalryman known for his daring raids.
